div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p:
Marlette Community Schools is proud to announce the Class of 2020 Senior Scholars.
Jordyn Boyne
Sidney Coltson
Marissa Crase
Riley Ford
Carleigh Nickens
Josie Schuitman
Lilly Wilson
Congratulations to these fine students! Please see the attached document for a full press release.

DELIVERY REMINDER- Meals/packets will be left on your porch today. Our volunteers can not directly hand off anything. Please leave a cooler if you will not be home. Thank you for helping to keep everyone safe! Miss you all!
Congratulations to the elementary Students of the Week, Finlee & T'Riq! #RedRaiderNation

The School Board Meeting scheduled for Monday, April 13, 2020 at 7:00 p.m. will be held virtually on Zoom at the regularly scheduled time. To connect to the meeting, go to the Events section of the Marlette Community Schools web site and click on the meeting then click on the Zoom link to take you to the meeting.

p.a: Event: JR High Football vs Memphis 6pm
